separators.commands.selectSymbols.title: Separators: Select Symbols
separators.commands.whatsNew.title: Separators: What's New
separators.configuration.title: Separators
List of symbols in which the separators will be drawn
separators.configuration.location.descri: Indicates the locations (relative to the symbols) where the separators will be drawn
separators.configuration.aboveComments.r: Indicates the comment rules to draw separators above comments
Specifies the name of the rule
Specifies the list of language IDs to which this rule applies
Specifies the rules to match comments
Specifies the glob pattern to match single line comments
Specifies the list of patterns to match multi line comments
Specifies the glob pattern to match multi line comments start
Specifies the glob pattern to match multi line comments end
separators.configuration.minimumLineCoun: Specifies the minimum number of lines that a symbol must have to draw separators
separators.configuration.functions.ignor: Controls whether callback/inline Functions should be ignored
separators.configuration.maxDepth.descri: Indicates the maximum depth (level) which the separators should be rendered. Any value below 1 means there is no limit.
separators.configuration.useOriginalGree: Use the original greenish separator for Methods, Functions and Constructors
separators.configuration.methods.borderW: Width of the border on top of Methods (in px)
separators.configuration.methods.borderS: Style of the border on top of Methods
separators.colors.methods.borderColor.de: Color of the border on top of Methods
separators.configuration.functions.borde: Width of the border on top of Functions (in px)
Style of the border on top of Functions
Color of the border on top of Functions
separators.configuration.constructors.bo: Width of the border on top of Constructors (in px)
Style of the border on top of Constructors
separators.colors.constructors.borderCol: Color of the border on top of Constructors
separators.configuration.classes.borderW: Width of the border on top of Classes (in px)
separators.configuration.classes.borderS: Style of the border on top of Classes
separators.colors.classes.borderColor.de: Color of the border on top of Classes
separators.configuration.interfaces.bord: Width of the border on top of Interfaces (in px)
Style of the border on top of Interfaces
separators.colors.interfaces.borderColor: Color of the border on top of Interfaces
separators.configuration.enums.borderWid: Width of the border on top of Enums (in px)
separators.configuration.enums.borderSty: Style of the border on top of Enums
separators.colors.enums.borderColor.desc: Color of the border on top of Enums
separators.configuration.namespaces.bord: Width of the border on top of Namespaces (in px)
Style of the border on top of Namespaces
separators.colors.namespaces.borderColor: Color of the border on top of Namespaces
separators.configuration.structs.borderW: Width of the border on top of Structs (in px)
separators.configuration.structs.borderS: Style of the border on top of Structs
separators.colors.structs.borderColor.de: Color of the border on top of Structs
separators.walkthroughs.title: Get Started with Separators
separators.walkthroughs.description: Learn more about Separators to optimize your workflow
separators.walkthroughs.automaticDetecti: Separators automatically detects the symbols in your code and draws separators above them
separators.walkthroughs.selectSymbols.de: Select the symbols in which the separators will be drawn
separators.walkthroughs.customizingAppea:
Customize how Separators are presented, the line style and colors
[Open Settings - Separators](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%5B%22separators%22%5D)
separators.walkthroughs.customizingLocat:
Customize the location of the separators, above and/or below the symbols, or above the comments
[Open Settings - Separators](command:workbench.action.openSettings?%5B%22separators.location%22%5D)
